[entity2] In the event that a change occurs in the area of the Leased Premises under such conditions ( and only in them ) , then , in addition to the change in the Rent , there will be a change in the size of the area of the Leased Premises for the purpose of making the other payments which the Entity2 pays pursuant to this Agreement , in accordance with the area of the Leased Premises , and the payments and the collateral of the Entity2 will be changed accordingly . [entity1] If Entity2 uses heat or air conditioning systems in excess of seventy five ( 75 ) hours per calendar week in any calendar year for a number of weeks which in the aggregate exceed over twenty - five percent ( 25 % ) of the weeks in such calendar year , Entity2 shall pay to Entity1 , upon billing , the cost of the increased wear and tear on existing equipment ( including without limitation , the accelerated depreciation thereof ) caused by such excess consumption as reasonably determined by Entity1 . [entity2] If Entity2 uses heat or air conditioning systems in excess of seventy five ( 75 ) hours per calendar week in any calendar year for a number of weeks which in the aggregate exceed over twenty - five percent ( 25 % ) of the weeks in such calendar year , Entity2 shall pay to Entity1 , upon billing , the cost of the increased wear and tear on existing equipment ( including without limitation , the accelerated depreciation thereof ) caused by such excess consumption as reasonably determined by Entity1 .	[1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]
[entity1] Amounts payable by Entity2 to Entity1 for such excess use of heat or air conditioning systems shall be deemed Additional Rent hereunder and shall be billed on a monthly basis .	[1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]
[entity2] Amounts payable by Entity2 to Entity1 for such excess use of heat or air conditioning systems shall be deemed Additional Rent hereunder and shall be billed on a monthly basis .	[0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]

[entity1] In the event that as of the Delivery Date ( i ) the Common Area is in not in compliance with all such federal , state and local laws and regulations , without regard to Entity2 's use of the Premises or the Entity2 Improvements subsequently constructed on or installed in the Premises ( herein the " Compliance Condition " ) , and ( ii ) Entity2 delivers to Entity1 written notice of the existence of the Compliance Condition ( the " Non - Compliance Notice " ) by the date which is one hundred eighty ( 180 ) days after the Commencement Date ( the " Non - Compliance Outside Date " ) , then Entity1 shall , at Entity1 's sole cost and expense which expense shall not be included in Additional Rent , promptly do that work which is necessary to put the applicable components of the Common Area described in the Non - Compliance Notice into the Compliance Condition ; provided , further , that to the extent any such work is required or triggered by Entity2 's proposed use of the Premises ( other than office use ) or Alterations to be constructed therein by Entity2 , then Entity1 shall perform such work , but Entity2 shall pay Entity1 for the cost of such work within thirty ( 30 ) days after invoice by Entity1 .	[1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0]
[entity2] In the event that as of the Delivery Date ( i ) the Common Area is in not in compliance with all such federal , state and local laws and regulations , without regard to Entity2 's use of the Premises or the Entity2 Improvements subsequently constructed on or installed in the Premises ( herein the " Compliance Condition " ) , and ( ii ) Entity2 delivers to Entity1 written notice of the existence of the Compliance Condition ( the " Non - Compliance Notice " ) by the date which is one hundred eighty ( 180 ) days after the Commencement Date ( the " Non - Compliance Outside Date " ) , then Entity1 shall , at Entity1 's sole cost and expense which expense shall not be included in Additional Rent , promptly do that work which is necessary to put the applicable components of the Common Area described in the Non - Compliance Notice into the Compliance Condition ; provided , further , that to the extent any such work is required or triggered by Entity2 's proposed use of the Premises ( other than office use ) or Alterations to be constructed therein by Entity2 , then Entity1 shall perform such work , but Entity2 shall pay Entity1 for the cost of such work within thirty ( 30 ) days after invoice by Entity1 .	[1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0]
[entity1] If Entity2 fails to deliver the Non - Compliance Notice to Entity1 on or prior to the Non - Compliance Outside Date , Entity1 shall have no obligation to perform the work described in the foregoing provisions of this Section 9(b ) ; provided that Entity1 shall remain responsible for making all alterations and improvements which are Entity1 's responsibility to repair and maintain pursuant to Section 8(b)(i ) above .	[1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0]
[entity2] If Entity2 fails to deliver the Non - Compliance Notice to Entity1 on or prior to the Non - Compliance Outside Date , Entity1 shall have no obligation to perform the work described in the foregoing provisions of this Section 9(b ) ; provided that Entity1 shall remain responsible for making all alterations and improvements which are Entity1 's responsibility to repair and maintain pursuant to Section 8(b)(i ) above . [entity1] If after Entity2 's review of such Expense Information , Entity1 and Entity2 can not agree upon the amount of Entity2 's Share of Operating Expenses , then Entity2 shall have the right to have an independent public accounting firm selected by Entity2 from among the 4 largest in the United States , working pursuant to a fee arrangement other than a contingent fee ( at Entity2 's sole cost and expense ) and approved by Entity1 ( which approval shall not be unreasonably withheld , conditioned or delayed ) , audit and/or review the Expense Information for the year in question ( the " Independent Review " ) . [entity1] Therefore , if any installment of Rent due from Entity2 is not received by Entity1 within 5 days after the date such payment is due , Entity2 shall pay to Entity1 an additional sum equal to 6 % of the overdue Rent as a late charge .	[0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]
[entity2] Therefore , if any installment of Rent due from Entity2 is not received by Entity1 within 5 days after the date such payment is due , Entity2 shall pay to Entity1 an additional sum equal to 6 % of the overdue Rent as a late charge .	[1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]

[entity2] Notwithstanding the foregoing , before assessing a late charge the first time in any calendar year , Entity1 shall provide Entity2 written notice of the delinquency and will waive the right if Entity2 pays such delinquency within 5 days thereafter .	[0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]

[entity2] Although state law does not require a CASp inspection of the subject premises , the commercial property owner or entity1 may not prohibit the entity2 or entity2 from obtaining a CASp inspection of the subject premises for the occupancy or potential occupancy of the entity2 or entity2 , if requested by the entity2 or entity2 . [0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0]
[entity2] Although state law does not require a CASp inspection of the subject premises , the commercial property owner or entity1 may not prohibit the entity2 or entity2 from obtaining a CASp inspection of the subject premises for the occupancy or potential occupancy of the entity2 or entity2 , if requested by the entity2 or entity2 .	[0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1]
[entity1] In furtherance of and in connection with such notice : ( i ) Entity2 , having read such notice and understanding Entity2 's right to request and obtain a CASp inspection , hereby elects not to obtain such CASp inspection and forever waives its rights to obtain a CASp inspection with respect to the Premises , Building and/or Project to the extent permitted by Legal Requirements ; and ( ii ) if the waiver set forth in clause ( i ) hereinabove is not enforceable pursuant to Legal Requirements , then Entity1 and Entity2 hereby agree as follows ( which constitutes the mutual agreement of the parties as to the matters described in the last sentence of the foregoing notice ) : ( A ) Entity2 shall have the one - time right to request for and obtain a CASp inspection , which request must be made , if at all , in a written notice delivered by Entity2 to Entity1 ; ( B ) any CASp inspection timely requested by Entity2 shall be conducted ( 1 ) at a time mutually agreed to by Entity1 and Entity2 , ( 2 ) in a professional manner by a CASp designated by Entity1 and without any testing that would damage the Premises , Building or Project in any way , and ( 3 ) at Entity2 's sole cost and expense , including , without limitation , Entity2 's payment of the fee for such CASp inspection , the fee for any reports prepared by the CASp in connection with such CASp inspection ( collectively , the ‚Äú CASp Reports ‚Äù ) and all other costs and expenses in connection therewith ; ( C ) the CASp Reports shall be delivered by the CASp simultaneously to Entity1 and Entity2 ; ( D ) Entity2 , at its sole cost and expense , shall be responsible for making any improvements , alterations , modifications and/or repairs to or within the Premises to correct violations of construction - related accessibility standards including , without limitation , any violations disclosed by such CASp inspection ; and ( E ) if such CASp inspection identifies any improvements , alterations , modifications and/or repairs necessary to correct violations of construction - related accessibility standards relating to those items of the Building and Project located outside the Premises that are Entity1 's obligation to repair as set forth in this Lease , then Entity1 shall perform such improvements , alterations , modifications and/or repairs as and to the extent required by Legal Requirements to correct such violations , and Entity2 shall reimburse Entity1 for the cost of such improvements , alterations , modifications and/or repairs within 10 business days after Entity2 's receipt of an invoice therefor from Entity1 .	[1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0]
[entity2] In furtherance of and in connection with such notice : ( i ) Entity2 , having read such notice and understanding Entity2 's right to request and obtain a CASp inspection , hereby elects not to obtain such CASp inspection and forever waives its rights to obtain a CASp inspection with respect to the Premises , Building and/or Project to the extent permitted by Legal Requirements ; and ( ii ) if the waiver set forth in clause ( i ) hereinabove is not enforceable pursuant to Legal Requirements , then Entity1 and Entity2 hereby agree as follows ( which constitutes the mutual agreement of the parties as to the matters described in the last sentence of the foregoing notice ) : ( A ) Entity2 shall have the one - time right to request for and obtain a CASp inspection , which request must be made , if at all , in a written notice delivered by Entity2 to Entity1 ; ( B ) any CASp inspection timely requested by Entity2 shall be conducted ( 1 ) at a time mutually agreed to by Entity1 and Entity2 , ( 2 ) in a professional manner by a CASp designated by Entity1 and without any testing that would damage the Premises , Building or Project in any way , and ( 3 ) at Entity2 's sole cost and expense , including , without limitation , Entity2 's payment of the fee for such CASp inspection , the fee for any reports prepared by the CASp in connection with such CASp inspection ( collectively , the ‚Äú CASp Reports ‚Äù ) and all other costs and expenses in connection therewith ; [entity1] If Entity2 desires to assign , sublease , hypothecate or otherwise transfer this Lease or sublet the Premises ( or a portion thereof ) other than pursuant to a Permitted Assignment ( as defined below ) , then at least 15 days , but not more than 90 business days , before the date Entity2 desires the assignment or sublease to be effective ( the " Assignment Date " ) , Entity2 shall give Entity1 a notice ( the " Assignment Notice " ) containing such information about the proposed assignee or subentity2 , including the proposed use of the Premises and any Hazardous Materials proposed to be used , stored handled , treated , generated in or released or disposed of from the Premises , the Assignment Date , any relationship between Entity2 and the proposed assignee or subentity2 , and all material terms and conditions of the proposed assignment or sublease , including a copy of any proposed assignment or sublease in its final form , and such other information as Entity1 may deem reasonably necessary or appropriate to its consideration whether to grant its consent . [entity1] Entity2 hereby represents and warrants to Entity1 that ( i ) neither Entity2 nor any of its legal predecessors has been required by any prior entity1 , lender or Governmental Authority at any time to take remedial action in connection with Hazardous Materials contaminating a property which contamination was permitted by Entity2 of such predecessor or resulted from Entity2 's or such predecessor 's action or use of the property in question , and ( ii ) Entity2 is not subject to any enforcement order issued by any Governmental Authority in connection with the use , storage , handling , treatment , generation , release or disposal of Hazardous Materials ( including , without limitation , any order related to the failure to make a required reporting to any Governmental Authority ) . [entity1] Without limiting the foregoing , Entity1 shall have the right ( but not the obligation ) to do any of the following upon an Event of Default that is not cured within the period set forth in Section 13 : ( a ) sue for the specific performance of any covenant of Entity2 as to which it is in breach or for the performance of any other obligation of Entity2 under this Lease ; ( b ) enter upon any portion of the Premises , terminate this Lease , dispossess Entity2 from the Premises through appropriate legal procedures and/or collect money damages by reason of Entity2 's breach , including the acceleration of all Rent which would have accrued after such termination and all obligations and liabilities of Entity2 under this Lease which survive the termination of the Term ; ( c ) elect to leave this Lease in place and sue for Rent and other money damages as the same come due ; and ( d ) ( before or after repossession of the Premises pursuant to clause ( b ) above and whether or not this Lease has been terminated ) assign this Lease from Entity2 to a third party selected by Entity1 , in which case Entity2 agrees to consent to such assignment , and execute any and all documents necessary to effect such assignment ; provided , that rent received from such third party assignee / new entity2 shall serve to mitigate Entity2 's obligation for damages to Entity1 hereunder . [entity2] Without limiting the foregoing , Entity1 shall have the right ( but not the obligation ) to do any of the following upon an Event of Default that is not cured within the period set forth in Section 13 : ( a ) sue for the specific performance of any covenant of Entity2 as to which it is in breach or for the performance of any other obligation of Entity2 under this Lease ; ( b ) enter upon any portion of the Premises , terminate this Lease , dispossess Entity2 from the Premises through appropriate legal procedures and/or collect money damages by reason of Entity2 's breach , including the acceleration of all Rent which would have accrued after such termination and all obligations and liabilities of Entity2 under this Lease which survive the termination of the Term ; ( c ) elect to leave this Lease in place and sue for Rent and other money damages as the same come due ; and ( d ) ( before or after repossession of the Premises pursuant to clause ( b ) above and whether or not this Lease has been terminated ) assign this Lease from Entity2 to a third party selected by Entity1 , in which case Entity2 agrees to consent to such assignment , and execute any and all documents necessary to effect such assignment ; provided , that rent received from such third party assignee / new entity2 shall serve to mitigate Entity2 's obligation for damages to Entity1 hereunder . [entity2] Except for non - structural Alterations that ( a ) do not exceed $ 150,000.00 in the aggregate , ( b ) are not visible from the exterior of the Premises if the Entity2 leases less than all of the Building , or are not visible from the exterior of the Building if Entity2 leases the entire Building , and ( c ) do not affect any Building System or any structural elements of the Building , including , without limitation , the foundation , load - bearing walls , windows , façade , and roof of the Building ( collectively , " Structural Alterations " ) , Entity2 shall not make or permit any Alterations in or to the Premises without first obtaining Entity1 's consent , which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld . [entity1] With respect to any Alterations made by or on behalf of Entity2 ( whether or not the Alteration requires Entity1 's consent ) : ( i ) not less than 10 days prior to commencing any Alteration , if required for the applicable Alteration , Entity2 shall deliver to Entity1 the plans , specifications and necessary permits for the Alteration , if any , together with certificates evidencing that Entity2 's contractors and subcontractors have adequate insurance coverage naming Entity1 , Entity1 's manager and any other associated or affiliated entity as their interests may appear as additional insureds , ( ii ) Entity2 shall obtain Entity1 's prior written approval of any contractor or subcontractor , such approval not to be unreasonably withheld , conditioned or delayed , ( iii ) the Alteration shall be constructed with new materials , in a good and workmanlike manner , and in compliance with all Laws and the plans and specifications delivered to , and , if required above , approved by Entity1 , ( iv ) Entity2 shall pay Entity1 all reasonable out of pocket costs and expenses in connection with Entity1 's review of Entity2 's plans and specifications , and of any supervision or inspection of the construction Entity1 deems necessary , and ( v ) if the total anticipated cost of the Alterations exceeds $ 150,000.00 , upon Entity1 's request Entity2 shall , prior to commencing any Alteration , provide Entity1 reasonable security against liens arising out of such construction .	[0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0]
[entity1] Any Alteration by Entity2 shall be the property of Entity2 until the expiration or termination of this Lease ; at that time without payment by Entity1 the Alteration shall remain on the Property and become the property of Entity1 unless Entity1 gives notice to Entity2 to remove it , in which event Entity2 will remove it , will repair any resulting damage and will restore the Premises to the condition existing prior to Entity2 's Alteration .
